total_revenue.context: Q1 revenue of $9.83 billion, up 8% year-over-year and in constant currency.

subscription_support_revenue.context: Subscription & support revenue of $9.3 billion, up 8% nominal and 9% CC.

non_gaap_operating_margin.context: Q1 non-GAAP operating margin of 32.3%, a 20-bp expansion year-over-year.

operating_cash_flow.context: Q1 operating cash flow of $6.5 billion, up 4% year-over-year.

free_cash_flow.context: Q1 free cash flow of $6.3 billion, up 4% year-over-year.

share_repurchases.context: Repurchased $2.7 billion of stock in Q1.

dividends.context: Paid $402 million in dividends and increased the payout by 4%.

total_returns.context: Returned $3.1 billion to shareholders in the quarter.

arr.context: Data Cloud and AI ARR surpassed $1 billion, up over 120% year-over-year.

agentforce_deals.context: Salesforce closed over 8,000 Agentforce deals since launch, with roughly 4,000 paid.

agentforce_cases.context: Agentforce processed 750,000 help portal cases, cutting volume by 7% year-over-year.

records_ingested.context: Data Cloud ingested 22 trillion records in Q1, up 175% year-over-year.

current_rpo.context: CRPO ended the quarter at $29.6 billion, up 12% year-over-year.

total_rpo.context: Total RPO of $60.9 billion, up 13% year-over-year.

multi_cloud.context: Over half of the Q1 top 100 deals included 6+ clouds, Tableau featured in 70% of $1M+ wins, and MuleSoft in nearly half.

informatica.description: Announced Informatica acquisition to expand enterprise data capabilities.
key_points: Expected to close early FY27 (Feb 2026) and be accretive to non-GAAP EPS and free cash flow by year two.
Financed through cash and debt with no dilution or disruption to capital return strategy.
Accelerates data harmonization necessary for large-scale agent deployments.

ecosystem.description: Operational excellence + partnerships fueling AI adoption.
highlights: Partners participated in 7 of the top 10 deals; Salesforce is the fastest-growing ISV on AWS Marketplace.
Forward-deployed engineering teams working with customers and partners daily to accelerate consumption and trust.
Industry clouds continued momentum: U.S. Air Force, University of Chicago Medicine, Pfizer, Takeda.

metadata.source: Q1 2026 earnings call transcript & press release
